type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.incremental.InputFileDetails
type.description: A change to an input file.

method.name: getFile
method.description:
The input file, which may no longer exist.

returns:the input file

method.name: isAdded
method.description:
Was the file added?

returns:true if the file was added since the last execution

method.name: isModified
method.description:
Was the file modified?

returns:if the file was modified

method.name: isRemoved
method.description:
Was the file removed?

returns:true if the file was removed since the last execution

property.name: added
property.description:
Was the file added?

returns:true if the file was added since the last execution

property.name: file
property.description:
The input file, which may no longer exist.

returns:the input file

property.name: modified
property.description:
Was the file modified?

returns:if the file was modified

property.name: removed
property.description:
Was the file removed?

returns:true if the file was removed since the last execution
